FulfillmentStepJeopardyRule.name: FulfillmentStepJeopardyRule
FulfillmentStepJeopardyRule.description: Represents the duration and tolerance for the step in the fulfillment process to allow the overall tracking of rules and risks.

EstimatedDuration.description: The estimated time to complete the fulfillment step.

EstimatedDurationUnit.description: The unit of measurement that applies to the estimated time to complete the fulfillment step.

FlowDefinition.description: The flow definition that's associated with the AutoTask type of the fulfillment step.

IntegrationDefinitionId.description: The integration definition that's associated with the Callout type of the fulfillment step.

JeopardyThreshold.description: The value indicating the threshold after which the fulfillment step is in jeopardy.

JeopardyThresholdUnit.description: The unit of measurement that applies to the jeopardy threshold value.

StepType.description: The type of fulfillment step that's affected by the jeopardy rule.
